subject: Re: [junit] Re: Mock objects...
msgSnippet: On Fri, 16 Jul 2004 23:31:45 -0000, cypherfox  ... Not true... mocks represent a language independent pattern.
messageBody:
On Fri, 16 Jul 2004 23:31:45 -0000, "cypherfox" <cypherfox@...>
said:
>
> Greetings,
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...>
> > Solution? jMock. www.jmock.org
> That's...impressive. That's some very, very deep magic, and I
> like
> it. I think understanding that framework is going to be my
> weekend
> project. It is such a pity that it's not possible with C++,

Not true... mocks represent a language independent pattern.
